en.statement: I was left speechless by the most exclusive niche perfumery I’ve ever visited.
en.name: Stela Džajić

en.statement: The best perfume shop in Belgrade! All of the staff members are very friendly.
en.name: Irina Malikova

en.statement: I have been in many perfumeries around the world, but this one has a special touch for me.
en.name: Saša Oljača

sr.statement: Pažljivo odabrane i divno prezentovane niche kuče! Baš ono što je bilo potrebno da upotpuni “parfemsku scenu” ovog grada
sr.name: Dragana Tasić Otašević

sr.statement: Jedinstven doživljaj na svakom nivou! Divno uređen prostor, i interakcija sa mušterijama.
sr.name: Matija Žigić

sr.statement: Kakav utisak ostavljala ova parfimerija! Mesto na kojem se uspomene čuvaju u bočicama.
sr.name: Ksenija Dunđerski
